identity.mission: Create a fresh, organic, and highly efficient shopping experience that feels like a modern kitchen tool, not a spreadsheet.
principles: Fusion: Mix 'Organic Market' aesthetics with 'Swiss Precision' layouts.
Emotion: Every interaction should feel 'crisp' like biting into a fresh apple.
Content: The food is the hero. Use whitespace to let the items breathe.
Zoom In: Focus on the essential numbers (stock count, price).
Negative Space: Use generous padding to prevent clutter.

headings.usage: Main titles, section headers, big numbers.

primary.name: Fresh Sage
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, stock indicators.

secondary.name: Harvest Orange
secondary.usage: Call to actions (Add to Cart), alerts, highlights.

rules: Use the 'Fresh Sage' for positive reinforcement (stock added).
Use 'Harvest Orange' sparingly for high-priority actions.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode A): Mix of 2x2 (Summary), 1x2 (Lists), and 1x1 (Quick Actions).
grid_system.lists: Vertical stack with generous gap-4 or gap-6.

buttons.primary: bg-[#4A7C59] text-white hover:bg-[#3A6346] shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all

cards.style: Flat with subtle border, NO heavy shadows. Use 'border border-gray-100 bg-white'.

inputs.style: bg-[#F9FAFB] border-transparent focus:border-[#4A7C59] focus:bg-white transition-all rounded-xl h-12

voice_visualizer.description: A visual representation of voice input.
voice_visualizer.style: Animated bars or a pulsing circle using Framer Motion. Color: #F46036 (Orange) when active.

calculator.style: Floating panel or integrated bottom bar. Clean, large numbers. Font: Manrope.

hero_bg.usage: Dashboard header background (with overlay) or Landing page hero.

pantry_bg.usage: Stock management section header or empty state background.

categories.fruits: Use Phosphor Icons (Apple, Carrot, etc.) or similar vector icons.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no default shadows.
Typography First: Let the font weight and size create hierarchy, not just color.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should feel tactile. Lists should flow.
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast is high (Sage Green on White is tricky, check contrast). Use darker green for text if needed.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion'. 2. Set up the Tailwind config with the custom colors. 3. Build the 'VoiceInput' component with a visualizer. 4. Use the 'Bento' layout for the main dashboard. 5. Ensure the 'Calculator' is always accessible in the shopping mode.
